TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsJitIntrinsic extends System.Object
public ref class IsJitIntrinsic abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示修改的方法是 Just-In-Time (JIT) 編譯器可執行特殊程式碼產生作業的內建值。

span.span: Indicates that a modified method is an intrinsic value for which the just-in-time (JIT) compiler can perform special code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編譯器會發出中繼資料，以變更預設行為不適用時，在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器，處理值的方式中的自訂修飾詞。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 當 JIT 編譯器遇到的自訂修飾詞時，它會處理修飾詞指定的方式中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 編譯器可以套用的自訂修飾詞來方法、 參數和傳回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 編譯器的必要修飾詞必須回應，但可以忽略的選擇性修飾詞。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 您可以發出自訂修飾詞至中繼資料，使用下列技巧：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法類別如， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 產生 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令檔，其中包含呼叫`modopt`和`modreq`，然後將組合至檔案最[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用 unmanaged 的反映 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API.
